page.title: 17A Family Day
page.content:
One time our family walked to Church Ope Cove. When we got there we had to walk down the steep steps to the beach and then we spread a blanket over a big rock near the sea. I put on my trunks and went into the water. When we were in the water my brother and I had a water fight. Soon afterwards we both came out of the water and went to a different rock to dry out in the sun. It didn't take long and then we had a picnic lunch. Afterwards my brother and I started to climb the rocks to look for caves and fossils. When we came down from the rocks we collected our things and went to Easton to buy some sweets and newspapers. Then we went home.
Michael Douglas, aged 11.
